31870.name: Westbridge Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the southern passage up
through the ceiling.  Transportation is to the south, or exit to Westbridge
to the north.

31875.name: The Tunnel To Accomaxx
description: This cave leads under the Istar Sea, from Torregiano to The Legion Base
known as AccoMaxx, an island in the sea of Istar.  The tunnel goes to the
north and south, water drips from the ceiling and runs down the wall.  To
either side of the cave, you see a small trench which holds the water.
Makou Gas Lanterns hang from the walls, giving off a dark, green light.

31800.name: Westbridge Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the eastern passage up
through the ceiling and continue on to the west here.  You can board cars
bound for the south, east and west from the docks here, or exit to
Westbridge to the north.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31839.name: Northbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see
the southbound cars to the west, but just out of range to switch directions.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31898.name: The Tunnel To Accomaxx
description: This cave leads under the Istar Sea, from Torregiano to The Legion Base
known as AccoMaxx, an island in the sea of Istar.  The tunnel goes to the
north and south, water drips from the ceiling and runs down the wall.  To
either side of the cave, you see a small trench which holds the water.
Makou Gas Lanterns hang from the walls, giving off a dark, green light.

31887.name: The Torregiano Roadway {&[{RR{x37{&]{x
description: The mountains, a group of mountains that extends from the Sea Of Swords
to the unknown world to the west, are known as the "High Mountains".  They
seem to be the largest mountains in the Realms Of Balance.  The Stardust
Trailway, makes it way passed these mountains, by a large mountain pass.
The road goes between a flat part, between two high mountains.  A large
forest surrounds the path.  To either side you can see the trees going up
the mountain slop.

31854.name: End of Southern Service
description: An extensively worked cavern, looks like a lot more work had to go into
cutting out the southern wall of this room, you can see the dock of Figaro
Castle just to the south.  Cars here are stopping for just a moment and then
moving on back to the north.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31831.name: Northbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see
the southbound cars to the west, but just out of range to switch directions.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31862.name: Westbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see
the eastbound cars to the south, but just out of range to switch directions.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31856.name: Northbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see

a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined

31857.name: Northbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see
the southbound cars to the west, but just out of range to switch directions.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31860.name: Connection Terminal
description: A short walkway between the main line and the Ofcal connection line.
Pipes run along the ceiling, and stones have been carefully laid here to
provide a nice walkway to the dock, you can board now for the cars leaving
for Ofcal to the west, or exit to the Main line to the East.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31851.name: Southbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see
the northbound cars to the east, but just out of range to switch directions.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31824.name: Camalot Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the northern passage up
through the ceiling here.  Transportation is to the north and Camalot is to
the south.

31826.name: North-Southbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see
the cars from other direction here, you can probably switch back and forth
if you are quick.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31807.name: New Thalos Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the western passage up
through the ceiling here.  You can board for the cars leaving west and
south, or New Thalos is to the north.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31840.name: Torregiano Station
description: A large cavern cut out of the stone, extensive stoneworked flooring has
been placed here to provide a foundation and flooring, marble pillars hold
up the ceiling, and a beautifully decorated.  Far up in the ceiling you can
see Large pipes enter from all directions and maze around, finally leaving
along the ceilings of the northbound and southbound tunnels.  You can leave
on the southbound cars, or Torregiano is to the north.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31863.name: Ofcal Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the eastern passage up
through the ceiling here.  You can leave on the eastbound connection to the
Main Line to east and Ofcal is to the north.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31845.name: Ofcal/Polaris Southbound Dock
description: A large cavern, docks on either side of the room serve as boarding gates
to the North or South Bound cars, a bridge over the underground river and
transportation works allows you to change directions.  Polaris is to the
east, and the connection service to Ofcal is to the west.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31804.name: Eastbound Passage

a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined

at every stop.

31896.name: The Tunnel To Accomaxx
description: This cave leads under the Istar Sea, from Torregiano to The Legion Base

a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to

31884.name: The {RT{rorregiano {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x
description: You are walking on the Stardust Trailway, a proud road built by the
TriPower.  The road extends north through the forest, which is a very thick
forest.  To the north, large mountains rise above the tree line, leading to
the unknown.  From the trees, large orbs of light hang down, lighting the
way of the road.  This road leads directly to Torregiano, going north, or
south to the road that is between Westbridge and New Thalos.

31842.name: Southbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of

31867.name: Inside the cart
description: A Tripower cart, the interior of the cart is very plush and comfortable
almost as if it wasn't really meant to be driven, you can see the east and
west bound cars passing to either side of you through the tinted glass.

31846.name: Southbound Passage

31828.name: Stonebow Dale Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the northern passage up
through the ceiling here.  You can board the northbound cars here, and
Stonebow Dale is to the south.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds

31871.name: {yD{*ee{yp D{*ee{yp Und{*erne{yath {RT{rorregiano{x
description: You stand under the Torregiano Station, part of the Rail System.  This
area is very much like a cave, the walls are roughly cut out, and the only
thing here is a lantern, and a ladder going up and down.  Down, you can see
a strange glow, and to the north, a large cave leads into the depth of the
world.

31889.name: The {RT{rorregiano {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x
description: The cobble stone road of the Torregiano Roadway continues north and
south through the valley within the mountains.  On either side of you
trees line the valley floor, and up the mountains.  The mountains
known as the "High Mountains" cuts across the continent and into
unkown parts.  To the east a large road cuts into the woods, and goes
deep within.

31825.name: Shire Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the southern passage up
through the ceiling here.  Transportation is to the south, and the Shire
is to the north.

31849.name: Southbound Passage

31888.name: The {RT{rorregiano {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

to the unknown world to the west, are known as the "High Mountains".  They
seem to be the largest mountains in the Realms Of Balance.  The Stardust

The road goes between a flat part, between two high mountains.  A large
forest surrounds the path.  To either side you can see the trees going up
the mountain slop.

at every stop.

31802.name: Eastbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.
Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see
the eastbound cars to the north, but just out of range to switch directions.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

31895.name: The Torregiano Roadway {&[{RR{x37{&]{x
description: The mountain pass is to the south, leading pass the "High Mountains" to
the forest, and then the road between Westbridge and Torregiano.  To the
north, a lush plain of fields stands before you.  To the north, a large wall
of a very very large city stands.  Large towers stand on either end of the
wall, a green glow rises from the large towers.

31811.name: Westbound Passage
description: A natural water cavern, cut out by the rushing water over millions of
years, now slightly enlarged by the workcrews to make way for the cars.

31891.name: The Torregiano Roadway {&[{RR{x37{&]{x
description: The mountains, a group of mountains that extends from the Sea Of Swords
to the unknown world to the west, are known as the "High Mountains".  They
seem to be the largest mountains in the Realms Of Balance.  The Stardust
Trailway, makes it way passed these mountains, by a large mountain pass.
The road goes between a flat part, between two high mountains.  A large
forest surrounds the path.  To either side you can see the trees going up
the mountain slop.

31876.name: The Tunnel To Accomaxx
description: This cave leads under the Istar Sea, from Torregiano to The Legion Base
known as AccoMaxx, an island in the sea of Istar.  The tunnel goes to the
north and south, water drips from the ceiling and runs down the wall.  To
either side of the cave, you see a small trench which holds the water.
Makou Gas Lanterns hang from the walls, giving off a dark, green light.

31868.name: Inside the cart
description: A Tripower cart, the interior of the cart is very plush and comfortable
almost as if it wasn't really meant to be driven, you can see the north and
south bound cars passing to either side of you through the tinted glass.

31823.name: Eastbound Passage

31818.name: Hilp Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the eastern passage up
through the ceiling here.  You can board the eastbound cars here or Hilp is
to the north.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined

31835.name: Ofcal/Polaris Northbound Dock
description: A large cavern, docks on either side of the room serve as boarding gates
to the North or South Bound cars, a bridge over the underground river and
transportation works allows you to change directions.  Polaris is to the
east, and the connection service to Ofcal is to the west.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds
at every stop.

Pipes run along the ceiling on the way to thier destination.  You can see

if you are quick.
a set of three cars chained together, and a larger chain running to
the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined

31859.name: Polaris Station
description: A cavern cut out of the stone, pipes run from the eastern passage up
through the ceiling here.  Transportation is to the west, and Polaris is to
the north.

31880.name: The {RT{rorregiano {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x
description: You are walking on the Stardust Trailway, a proud road built by the
TriPower.  The road extends north through the forest, which is a very thick
forest.  To the north, large mountains rise above the tree line, leading to
the unknown.  From the trees, large orbs of light hang down, lighting the
way of the road.  This road leads directly to Torregiano, going north, or
south to the road that is between Westbridge and New Thalos.
{G<{g------ {MP{motsdam {CQ{Buick{CM{bart{x

31803.name: Gearworks Cavern
description: A large room, with reinforced walls, large pipes come in from the North
and split off in all directions, supplying Gas and Power to all the realms.
Chains wrap themselves around large gears all about, driving the cars both
east and west, north and south.  An Awe inspiring sight.  Steam and fumes
are exhausted from the ceiling.  A sign here directs you of your options.
North - Torregiano, Ofcal, Polaris
South - Figaro Castle, Mako
East  - New Thalos, Bloodstoner Mansion
West  - Westbridge, Shire, Camalot, Hilp Village, Stonebow Dale
c

the next set of three, they are wooden on the outside and well cushoined
within. They move along at a fairly good pace and stop for a few seconds

31866.name: Inside the Cart
description: A Tripower cart, the interior of the cart is very plush and comfortable
almost as if it wasn't really meant to be driven, you can see the east and
west bound cars passing to either side of you through the tinted glass.

31800.name: a Tri-Power Gate Guard~
description:
A large Guard, he looks to be very formable, best just show your pass 
and move on. He is dressed sharply in the Tri-Power Uniform, and refections
of the room can be seen in his polished boots.
 
This man will hurt you .... Don't doubt it for a second.
31800.d_flags: D {!You will pay for that with you life!!!!{0~
subroutines:
F res B
F vul HK
31800.room_name: A Gate Guard is here guarding the entrance

31801.name: a Tri-Power Priest~
description:
A portly man, he looks wise beyond his years, he is dressed in the
Tri-Power Priest's Garments. He examines everyone as they pass through
the gates to the cars.
subroutines:
F res B
F vul HK
31801.room_name: A Priest is here to assist the guard in his duties.

31802.name: a Tri-Power Guard~
description:
A large man, not as sharp as the master he trains under, and sports a
few bruises where he didn't learn fast enuf. He looks a bit unattentive
at the moment, but you can't be sure
subroutines:
F res B
F vul HK
31802.room_name: A Guard-in-Training Stands here learning from one of the best

31820.name: (no short description)~
subroutines:
F for A
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
